verses.verse: <S%G1377>Follow<s%> after <S%G26>charity,<s%> and <S%G2206>desire<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> gifts, but <S%G3123>rather<s%> that you may <S%G4395>prophesy.<s%>

For he that <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in an unknown <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> not to <S%G444>men,<s%> but to <S%G2316>God:<s%> for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G191>understands<s%> him; however, in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G3466>mysteries.<s%>
But he that <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G3619>edification,<s%> and <S%G3874>exhortation,<s%> and <S%G3889>comfort.<s%>
He that <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in an unknown <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G3618>edifies<s%> <S%G1438>himself;<s%> but he that <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> <S%G3618>edifies<s%> the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

I <S%G2309>would<s%> that you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>but <S%G3123>rather<s%> that you <S%G4395>prophesied:<s%> for <S%G3187>greater<s%> is he that <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> he that <S%G2980>speaks<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G1622>except<s%> <S%G1508><s%> he <S%G1329>interpret,<s%> that the <S%G1577>church<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3619>edifying.<s%>

<S%G3570>Now,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G2980>speaking<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G5623>profit<s%> you, <S%G3362>except<s%> I shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you <S%G2228>either<s%> by <S%G602>revelation,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by <S%G4394>prophesying,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by <S%G1322>doctrine?<s%>

And <S%G3676>even<s%> things <S%G895>without<s%> <S%G895>life<s%> <S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G5456>sound,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G836>pipe<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2788>harp,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G1325>give<s%> a <S%G1293>distinction<s%> in the <S%G5353>sounds,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall it be <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G832>piped<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2789>harped?<s%>
For <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> an <S%G82>uncertain<s%> <S%G5456>sound,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> shall <S%G3903>prepare<s%> himself to the <S%G4171>battle?<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> you, <S%G3362>except<s%> you <S%G1325>utter<s%> by the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G2154>easy<s%> to be <S%G2154>understood,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall it be <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G2980>spoken?<s%> for you shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G109>air.<s%>

There are, it may be, <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G1085>kinds<s%> of <S%G5456>voices<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G3762>none<s%> of them is <S%G880>without<s%> <S%G880>signification.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> not the <S%G1411>meaning<s%> of the <S%G5456>voice,<s%> I shall be to him that <S%G2980>speaks<s%> a <S%G915>barbarian,<s%> and he that <S%G2980>speaks<s%> shall be a <S%G915>barbarian<s%> to me.

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> you, for as <S%G1893>much<s%> as you are <S%G2207>zealous<s%> of <S%G4151>spiritual<s%> gifts, <S%G2212>seek<s%> that you may <S%G4052>excel<s%> to the <S%G3619>edifying<s%> of the <S%G1577>church.<s%>
<S%G1355>Why<s%> let him that <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in an unknown <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> that he may <S%G1329>interpret.<s%>
For <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G4336>pray<s%> in an unknown <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G4336>prays,<s%> but my <S%G3563>understanding<s%> is <S%G175>unfruitful.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> is it <S%G3767>then?<s%> I will <S%G4336>pray<s%> with the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and I will <S%G4336>pray<s%> with the <S%G3563>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> I will <S%G5567>sing<s%> with the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and I will <S%G5567>sing<s%> with the <S%G3563>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G1893>Else<s%> <S%G1437>when<s%> you shall <S%G2127>bless<s%> with the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall he that <S%G378>occupies<s%> the <S%G5117>room<s%> of the <S%G2399>unlearned<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G281>Amen<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> your giving of <S%G2169>thanks,<s%> <S%G1894>seeing<s%> he <S%G1492>understands<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> you <S%G3004>say?<s%>
For you <S%G3303>truly<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G2573>well,<s%> but the <S%G2087>other<s%> is not <S%G3618>edified.<s%>
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God,<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> than you <S%G3956>all:<s%>

<S%G235>Yet<s%> in the <S%G1577>church<s%> I had <S%G2309>rather<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> with my <S%G3563>understanding,<s%> that by my voice I might <S%G2727>teach<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3463>ten<s%> <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> in an unknown <S%G1100>tongue.<s%>

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> be not <S%G3813>children<s%> in <S%G5424>understanding:<s%> <S%G235>however,<s%> in <S%G2549>malice<s%> be you <S%G3515>children,<s%> but in <S%G5424>understanding<s%> be <S%G5046>men.<s%>

In the <S%G3551>law<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> With men of <S%G2084>other<s%> <S%G2084>tongues<s%> and <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G5491>lips<s%> will I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2992>people;<s%> and yet for <S%G3779>all<s%> that will they not <S%G1522>hear<s%> me, <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>LORD.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> are for a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> not to them that <S%G4100>believe,<s%> but to them that <S%G571>believe<s%> not: but <S%G4394>prophesying<s%> serves not for them that <S%G571>believe<s%> not, but for them which <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> be <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G846><s%> place, and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> and there <S%G1525>come<s%> in those that are <S%G2399>unlearned,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G571>unbelievers,<s%> will they not <S%G2046>say<s%> that you are <S%G3105>mad?<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy,<s%> and there <S%G1525>come<s%> in <S%G5100>one<s%> that <S%G571>believes<s%> not, <S%G2228>or<s%> one <S%G2399>unlearned,<s%> he is <S%G1651>convinced<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> he is <S%G350>judged<s%> of <S%G3956>all:<s%>

And <S%G3779>thus<s%> are the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of his <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5318>manifest;<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4098>falling<s%> down <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G4383>face<s%> he will <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G518>report<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> is in you of a <S%G3689>truth.<s%>

<S%G5101>How<s%> is it <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G80>brothers?<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together,<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one of you <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G5568>psalm,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G602>revelation,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G2058>interpretation.<s%> Let <S%G3956>all<s%> things be <S%G1096>done<s%> to <S%G3619>edifying.<s%>

<S%G1535>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2980>speak<s%> in an unknown <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> let it be by <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> at the <S%G4119>most<s%> by <S%G5140>three,<s%> and that by <S%G3313>course;<s%> and let <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1329>interpret.<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> there be <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1328>interpreter,<s%> let him <S%G4601>keep<s%> <S%G4601>silence<s%> in the <S%G1577>church;<s%> and let him <S%G2980>speak<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Let the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three,<s%> and let the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1252>judge.<s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> any thing be <S%G601>revealed<s%> to <S%G243>another<s%> that <S%G2521>sits<s%> by, let the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4601>hold<s%> his <S%G4601>peace.<s%>

For you <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> <S%G2596>one<s%> <S%G1520><s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> may <S%G3129>learn,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> may be <S%G3870>comforted.<s%>
And the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> to the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>
For <S%G2316>God<s%> is not the author of <S%G181>confusion,<s%> but of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> as in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

Let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G4601>keep<s%> <S%G4601>silence<s%> in the <S%G1577>churches:<s%> for it is not <S%G2010>permitted<s%> to them to <S%G2980>speak;<s%> but they are commanded to be <S%G5293>under<s%> obedience <S%G5293><s%>as <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, let them <S%G1905>ask<s%> their <S%G435>husbands<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3624>home:<s%> for it is a <S%G149>shame<s%> for <S%G1135>women<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> in the <S%G1577>church.<s%>
<S%G2228>What?<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> out from you? <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> it to you <S%G3441>only?<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G1380>think<s%> himself to be a <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> let him <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> that the things that I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you are the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man be <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> let him be <S%G50>ignorant.<s%>
<S%G5620>Why,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2206>covet<s%> to <S%G4395>prophesy,<s%> and <S%G2967>forbid<s%> not to <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>
Let <S%G3956>all<s%> things be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G2156>decently<s%> and in <S%G5010>order.<s%>
